content:
Don't forget to register for the January 13-15 Connectathon -- http://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/connectathon/2021/01/?ref=signature
Early bird registration deadline is December 30, 2020.

Formulary Track Participants - the Touchstone FHIR Testing Tool has some updated testscripts for use if you are ready to test your systems. We have uploaded the latest Formulary validation package and updated some of the existing scripts as well as added more scripts. They are be located at: https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/testdefinitions?selectedTestGrp=/FHIRSandbox/DaVinci/FHIR4-0-1-Test/PDEX/Formulary&activeOnly=false&contentEntry=TEST_SCRIPTS

Please feel free to contact us at touchstone_support@aegis.net or at our #touchstone stream if you need any assistance.
